kriyadocs | 156 followers on LinkedIn. kriyadocs is a document collaboration cloud platform that streamlines & accelerates publishing for books & journals.  | kriyadocs is the preferred publishing automation platform for several leading book and journal publishers. It enables authors, editors, copy-editors, proof-readers, typesetters and other key stakeholders in the publishing ecosystem to effortlessly collaborate towards producing rich, high quality content, faster. kriyadocs was launched in 2014 and has 30,000+ happy users globally. To know more about product features or to setup a demo, visit us at www.kriyadocs.com.
